EmailTemplate.name: IAM_Account_Application_Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online Account – Access Denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cummins
Thank you for your interest in a Cummins Online Login account. Your registration for {!IAM_Application__c.IAM_Account_Name__c} was Rejected because of below reason {!ApprovalRequest.Comments} If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINS™ or your Cummins account representative. Thank you for your interest in Cummins. Cummins https://cumminsengines.com/customer-care.aspx If you have trouble clicking on the button, please click to here. This auto-generated e-mail invitation is sent from Cummins.
